::FireBlade::
"Thank you for the good words my long lost friend," FireBlade 
said,"but you forgot about my excellent hearing" And let's out a 
laugh. "Yes, like SwitchBlade said I am FireBlade. My function is 
Ground Support/Backup. I ahve been programmed to protect SwitchBlade 
to the extent of my life for his. If SwtichBlade is in your 
services," he sais looking at Megatron "then so am I..."

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> ::Switchblade::
> Switchblade turns from FireBlade, "As a matter of fact I do, he's a 
> damn good proven warrior, named FireBlade, from Cybertron. I 
> would trust him with almost anything," then steps forwart to 
> Megatron in a quite voice, "except him in command of an assult 
> team, he's not that bright." He steps back to stand beside 
> FireBlade.
>

He picked
